songs.title: Ice Cream & Birthday Cake
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1: Shakewell]
The fuck is yo problem?
I'm mobbing on suckas I'm sipping on Sake I'm puffing on ganja
I shout out the plug then he prolly do life so I do not say nada
My homies is hungry they killing for food turn you into asada
I'll take your bitch and the products
Washing my head while I chill in a sauna
No Princess Leia she bow like kotona grab my katana
Fuck boy you don't really wanna
Keep it tucked I ain't flauntin
Step up and the pistol bombin
Never wake up in the morning
Majin Buu, the purple flowing
Never sleeping but I'm yawning
Keep it german if you tonin
You don't even really want it

[Verse 2: Pouya]
Dumb kids wil'ing outside
Pill popping smoking drugs in the lot
Gun by the lap
Hoes on the sack when I pull up in the back of the Lac get back
Like luda said in the red light district
"Hoe miss me with that fuck shit"
I pull out the dick and bust one into yo' stomach!
I ride with my homies
You never could clone me
The one and the only
Hoes be sucking and fucking
But really they don't even know me
Give me a Glock and a rock in my sock and I'll be okay
I been wil'ing on the street getting money all day
(getting money all day, getting money all day)

[Verse 3: Pouya]
Yuh
Stuck in my mind
Life, just wasting my time
Packing the 9 in case someone wanna get to mine
Can't find another man like me
Pull up [?] Nikes
I been feeling like a million bucks
Hundred bitches on my fucking nuts
Pull up in the Mercedes truck

[Verse 4: Shakewell]
Holy water dripping down the sink
Trying to bless me but it burn the skin
And when I pull in pull out she gon' eat the skeet
Just know its triple 6 when I rep my team
And never take it personal if I fuck yo' chick
And everyday I'm livin repping for my clique
She fucked on the bus but she still want the dick
Thank God for these hoes
But it's still fuck a bitch
